title: Sukh Knight @ World Headquarters
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/04/sukhknight2.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/04/sukhknight2.jpg)

Rusty Bucket Bay is back at World Headquarters (Newcastle) on the 29th of April with one of the most exciting line ups seen so far. This month see’s Sukh Knight, Funtcase and Heppy J take to the decks; and with Sukh Knight’s new record recently being played on primetime Radio 1, this could be your last chance to see him in such a small venue.  
Hailing from London, Sukh Knight brings with him one of the most unique sounds in dubstep, with clear eastern influences and a heavy bass the man has been setting crowds alight worldwide; and now it’s Newcastle’s turn

[Sukh Knight’s Myspace](http://www.myspace.com/sukhknight)

[Buy Tickets](http://www.wegottickets.com/event/78415)

[Check out Rusty Bucket’s site](http://www.rustybucketbay.co.uk/)
